data.title: Heber City, UT
data.meta_description: View information about the Heber City Police Department.
data.text:
Mission Statement

To improve the quality of life by preserving the peace and safety of the community through the formation of partnership; creating positive interaction between the public and police while continuing to serve the unique needs of the Heber community.

VISION STATEMENT

The Heber City Police Department's goal is to be the most professional and capable police department in the State of Utah.

911 INFORMATION

Do not call 911 for road conditions, weather conditions, for civil complaints or non-emergencies. An emergency, for example, is an accident, a death, a medical event, a crime against a person or any crime that is taking place at the time.
